name: Getwapps
tag_list: web, app, application, discover, organize, access, list, quick, personalized, home, page, social, bookmark
overview:
Getwapps is web 2.0 application. It is imagined as the central place on the web for managing userâ€™s favorite web content (web sites & applications, blogs, etc.).

  • Organize web sites and applications (online bookmarks)
  • Personalize your account with custom design
  • Discover new web content with wStore
  • Create public profile and share your links with others
  • Search people with same interests and view their bookmarks
  • Notify your friends about cool web sites
  • Chat wih your friends from Facebook and other IMs

In other words, Getwapps brings you social bookmarking
